All Classes

Class
Description
ApplicationMain
ApplicationMain class used to launch the game.
DynamicElement
Class to contain and represent the dynamic elements of the game.
Element
The Element class is the base class for the objects present in the maze.
ElementInterface
The Element interface is the base interface for the objects present in the maze.
Game
Main Game class which manages the state of the program.
GameInterface
Main Game interface which manages the state of the program.
Heart
Class to create heart objects to represent the life of the player.
Hero
Hero object which the player controls.
HpBar
Class to contain and represent the heart objects which corresponds to the hp of the player.
Maze
Maze class which contains the elements that make up the game, this includes, but is not limited to, static elements such as hero, path, walls, other special game objects and the actual maze in matrix form, generated from the MazeGenerator class.
MazeGenerator
Class which contains an algorithm to generate a random maze, represented by an array of ones and zeros.
MazeInterface
Maze interface which contains the elements that make up the game, this includes, but is not limited to, static elements such as hero, path, walls, other special game objects and the actual maze in matrix form, generated from the MazeGenerator class.
Menu
Menu class generate various types of menus.
MenuInterface
Menu interface generate various types of menus.
Node
Node class which stores a position object.
Path
Class which is responsible for pathing the trajectory of the player.
Position
The position class is responsible for handling the object's location on the lanterna screen.
PositionInterface
The position interface is responsible for handling the object's location on the lanterna screen.
RedPath
Class that creates the hazardous path which damages the player.
StaticElement
Extension Class for the static objects, i.e, objects that after generated, don't change positions.
Trophy
Class to create the goal of the maze.
Wall
Class to create the walls present in the game, these are immovable objects that the player cannot move through.
